meanings.definition: A chemical element with the symbol Al and atomic number 13.
meanings.sent1: Alumin is used in making cans for drinks.
meanings.sent2: I learned about alumin in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The alumin in the periodic table decided to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as alumin in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship was made of shiny alumin.

meanings.definition: To treat or impregnate with aluminum.
meanings.sent1: The workers alumin the metal to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: She decided to alumin her old pots and pans.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally aluminated the cake with too much aluminum.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to alumin her with confidence.
meanings.sent5: The magic potion was aluminated under the full moon.
